issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

This message was automatically generated.

Great work in patch 002. Just a few nitpicks.

index.md
* {{/user/foo.bar}} should be {{/user/foo/usr}} in the last curl command
* Wrap HTTP URL with single quotes in a all curl commands, e.g., {{curl http://...}} => {{curl 'http://...'}}. Otherwise, bash will interpret the {{&}} character.

TestHttpFSServer.java
* 218: Please revert if it is just coding style change
* 222: Please revert if it is just coding style change
* testHdfsRead: Has testOpenOffsetLength covered this case already?

[~jzhuge] thanks for your review.
Attach v3 patch to address your comments.

This message was automatically generated.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #11442 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/11442/])
HDFS-11561. HttpFS doc errors. Contributed by Yuanbo Liu. (jzhuge: rev ed2d03f2a5318a88d0eced8476127f303eb1d1d9)
* (edit) hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs-httpfs/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/http/server/TestHttpFSServer.java
* (edit) hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs-httpfs/src/site/markdown/index.md

Committed to trunk, branch-2, and branch-2.8.

Thanks [~yuanbo] for the contribution!
2.8.1 became a security release. Moving fix-version to 2.8.2 after the fact.
